roleset.name: bid more than
roleset.note: OUTBID-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outbid' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Minimal comparison with 'bid'. (from outbid.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: from corpus
example.text: Ratners Group PLC ... said it-1 would be prepared *trace*-1 to outbid Ratners's initial offer.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: ABC , a unit of Capital Cities / ABC Inc. , and General Electric Co. 's National Broadcasting Co. also risk losses if they outbid CBS for other contracts .
